summary:
I am from South Korea who came to the Netherlands to start a new adventure in my life. I started off by working as an intern using the working holiday visa in the logistics department at a company called STX. This is where I got to know how logistics worked and triggered my interests. With good reputation, I have got an offer to work full-time from the same company. This was the start of my logistics journey which eventually led me to staying in the Netherlands. I became to love the field of logistics since then. Each logistic process seemed like a challenging journey in which I had to handle from start until the end. The challenges and sense of accomplishments were the two main reasons I fell in love and got fascinated by logistics.

As of personal traits, I am an outgoing person who loves to make jokes and make people happy. I love getting people's attention so when spotlight comes to me, I tend to enjoy it!  As a fast learner, I knew how to adapt in any kind of environment and together with optimism, it helped me 'survive' foreign life. Now I am in a situation where I have the opportunity to teach other colleagues and share my logistics skills with them. With my multicultural point of view, I am flexible in understanding a diversity of things and have the ability to think out of the box. Adding the Dutch culture into my learning process, I am excited by the other possibilities and challenges that could occur in the future and would like to invite you by telling my adventurous story further on.

profile_positions.description:
Initiating and coordinating of the day-to-day logistics operations and processes, following-up quality events if needed also leading coordination of Material transfers.

• Planning and coordination of GMP shipments (Incoming and Outgoing)
• Creation of shipment documentation (and shipment protocol if needed)
• Lead/ Participate in QI follow up finalize QI’s with QA department.
• Inventory accuracy by means of cycle count performance and trouble shooting
• Providing solutions for internal and external clients on shipping packaging, methods, storage and inventory.
• Act on constrains and escalation to the owner of materials or project lead.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Handling imported containers at Rotterdam & Antwerp ports, providing high quality service to key accounts. 

- Responsible from quotation to delivery to end customer 
- Dedicated for LG chemical products which is Polymer products(POE,PP,EVA,HDPE,etc.)
- Arranging DG cargoes (batteries) for Renault/Volvo  
- Focusing on avoiding any extra costs such as demurrage and detention costs 
- Dealing with the shipping lines regarding the credit terms and improvement of business relationships
- Following unpredictable circumstances from the terminal to keep the customer updated 
- Making the Marketing business report once in every month to review our performance 
- Responsible for AR and AP every month and predicting the revenue
profile_positions.title: Logistics Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Arranging sea and air freight to meet the requested delivery date for the customer and elaborating invoices, payment slips.

- Responsible from quotation to delivery to end customer
- Negotiation with airline handling partner and shipping line
- Operation from Shipper’s warehouse to Consignee’s warehouse
- Communication with all European and Korean vendors
- Arranging customs clearance for regular import, export and fiscal representative
- Arranging trucking by FTL, LTL, FCL and LCL
- Handling dangerous goods
- Setting up Lotte chemical businesses regarding Purified Isophthalic Acid (P.I.A) and operating the delivery from South Korea to several European countries by RFS (sea freight + Inland transport by Silo truck)
- Responsible for AR and AP every month and predicting the revenue
- Reporting the delivery status to the customer consistently for maximum efficiency and performance
- Warehouse inventory control and planning.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Operator

profile_positions.description:
Working closely with the logistics department in elaborating high quality quotations for clients to support the sales objectives of the company.

- Responsible for German, Greek and Turkish market
- Responsible from quotation to order confirmation
- Negotiation with Korean vendors and clients
- Follow up of orders and settling of claims
- Daily communication with headquarters in South Korea
profile_positions.title: Sales Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Elaborating invoices and informing clients of delivery notifications to meet the lead times in the supply chain.

- Drawing up of purchase orders
- Determination of delivery costs and giving notice to clients
- Invoicing and taking care of outstanding invoices
- Daily communication with headquarters in South Korea
profile_positions.title: Logistics Intern

profile_positions.description:
Working as a barista at the Starbucks in Incheon Airport which is one of the busiest stores in Korea and also with the biggest revenues. 

- Managing shifts and schedules of staffs
- Controlling inventory and purchases
- Handling customer service
- Making coffee
profile_positions.title: Partner

volunteer_experiences.role: Main Keyboard and Co-leader of the Church Band
volunteer_experiences.description: I played the piano for a band within the church such as gospels and led the band in making arrangements of songs.
